settings.label: I would like to receive news and promotions from Grind.

settings.page_title: Win a night at The Ritz.
settings.introduction:
We’re seriously flattered that you’ve pre-ordered our book - we honestly thought it would only be our Mum ordering multiple copies.

To say thank you we’re giving you the chance to win a one night stay at The Ritz.

Fill in your details below for the chance to win!
settings.small_print: By submitting your entry you agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
settings.disclaimer: The prize is as stated, it is not transferable and there are no alternative prizes or cash substitutes. Grind reserves the right to substitute a prize of equal or greater value in the event that the selected prize is unavailable for any reason whatsoever. Competition Closes on 28th October. The winner will be chosen at random on 1st November 2021. UK entrants only and entrants must be over 18.

settings.contentBodyOne: Subscribe and get our compostable coffee pods for Nespresso® machines, whole bean or ground coffee delivered free, in letterbox-friendly packaging, plus a free refillable Grind tin with your first order.
settings.contentBodyTwo: Use code GETSTARTED and get your first delivery for £9.95, plus free shipping. No fuss - you can change, skip or cancel your subscription at any time.

settings.title: Introducing Grind One
settings.content_body: Introducing our very own pod machine, designed to get the best from our compostable Nespresso® pods and inspired by the Italian espresso machines we use every day in our London cafés.
settings.selling_point_content_1: With 19 bars of pressure, it's designed to make the most of our compostable coffee pods for Nespresso® machines.
settings.selling_point_content_2: it's built to last - an antidote to the mass-market plastic machines that seem destined for landfill.
settings.selling_point_content_3: With 19 bars of pressure, it's designed to make the most of our compostable coffee pods for Nespresso® machines.

settings.contentBody:
Subscribe and get our compostable coffee pods for Nespresso® machines, whole bean or ground coffee delivered free, in letterbox-friendly packaging, plus a free refillable Grind tin with your first order.

Use code GETSTARTED and get your first delivery for £9.95, plus free shipping. No fuss - you can change, skip or cancel your subscription at any time.

settings.title: The most sustainable Pods you can buy.
settings.body: Soil association certified 100% organic coffee, sourced and roasted by Grind in London. 0% plastic and 100% vegan.
